maqras.text: Ac ut My retribution est the multus painful retribution
Inform them Abraham's guests
When they iniit his quarters they dictus Pax. He dictus Nos est apprehensive de vos
They dictus non est apprehensive. Nos habet bonus news vos enlightened filius
He dictus Quam vos dedit me such bonus news when ego est ita veteris? Vos adhuc dedit me hoc bonus news
They dictus bonus news nos dedit vos est true perfecit non despair
He dictus Nullus despairs his Dominus mercy absque strayers
He dictus Quod est tuus mission O messengers
They dictus Nos dispatched guilty people
Prout pro Lot's familia nos save them totus
Non his uxor; she destined est cum the doomed
messengers iit Lot's oppidum
He dictus Vos est ignotus people
They dictus Nos bring vos quod they doubting
Nos bring vos truth; nos est truthful
Vos take tuus familia nox. Stay them factus sure ut nullus de vos looks back Iit straight prout commanded
Nos delivered eum hoc command those people est annihilated in the morning
people oppidum advenit joyfully
He dictus These est my guests; non embarrass me
Fear DEUS non shame me
They dictus nos non enjoin vos Perfecit ex contacting anyone
He dictus Hic est my filia vos must
Autem alas they totally blinded their lust
Consequently disaster struck them in the morning
Nos turned upside down showered them devastating rocks
Hoc est lesson those possess intelligence
Hoc semper est system
Hoc est signum believers
people silva alias est transgressors
Consequently nos avenged them ac ambo communities fully documented
people Al-Hijr disbelieved messengers
Nos dedit them noster revelations they disregarded them
They used carve secure domus montis
disaster hit them in the morning
quod they hoarded non help them
Nos non create caelum terra everything them specific purpose Finis saeculum advenit ita treat them benign neglect
Tuus Dominus est Creator Omniscient
Nos dedit vos 7 pairs major Quran
Est jealous de quod nos bestowed alius (messengers) non saddened disbelievers) inferior tuus wing believers
proclaim ego est manifest warner
Nos deal cum dividers
They accept Quran unus partially
De tuus Dominus nos question them totus
De everything they perfecit
Ergo carry orders dedit to vos disregard idol worshipers
Nos spare vos mockers
Qui set alias deus DEUS! They perfecit surely invenit out
Nos know foderator bene ut vos annoyed their utterances
Vos sing praises tuus Dominus est prostrators
worship tuus Dominus in order to attain certainty
